    • Method Detail

      • getTableSchema

        public static HCatSchema getTableSchema(org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration conf)
                                 throws IOException
        Gets the table schema for the table specified in the HCatOutputFormat.setOutput call on the specified job context. Note: This is the record-schema for the table. It does not include the table's partition columns.
        Parameters:
        conf - the Configuration object
        Returns:
        the table schema, excluding partition columns
        Throws:
        IOException - if HCatOutputFormat.setOutput has not been called for the passed context

      • getTableSchemaWithPartitionColumns

        public static HCatSchema getTableSchemaWithPartitionColumns(org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration conf)
                                                     throws IOException
        Gets the table schema for the table specified in the HCatOutputFormat.setOutput call on the specified job context. Note: This is the complete table-schema, including the record-schema *and* the partitioning schema.
        Parameters:
        conf - the Configuration object
        Returns:
        the table schema, including the record-schema and partitioning schema.
        Throws:
        IOException - if HCatOutputFormat.setOutput has not been called for the passed context

                      throws IOException,

        Parameters:
        context - information about the job
        Throws:
        IOException - when output should not be attempted
        InterruptedException

      • getJobInfo

        public static OutputJobInfo getJobInfo(org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration conf)
                                throws IOException
        Gets the HCatOuputJobInfo object by reading the Configuration and deserializing the string. If InputJobInfo is not present in the configuration, throws an exception since that means HCatOutputFormat.setOutput has not been called.
        Parameters:
        conf - the job Configuration object
        Returns:
        the OutputJobInfo object
        Throws:
        IOException - the IO exception

        Configure the output storage handler, with allowing specification of partvals from which it picks the dynamic partvals

        jobInfo - the output job info

        Throws:
